items.sentence: Tom goes to the library at least once a month.
Tom has become accustomed to living in Boston.
Do you have any idea what that guy\'s name is?
Do you have any idea where Tom might\'ve gone?
I wonder how much money Tom has in his wallet.
I wonder if Tom is really going out with Mary.
The man you see over there is a famous writer.
The police believe the victim knew his killer.
The teacher wrote something on the blackboard.
You\'re not as beautiful as you think you are.
You\'re not moving back to Australia, are you?
I\'ve always wanted to see if I could do that.
I\'ve asked Tom many times to stop doing that.
I\'ve been bitten by my own dog several times.
I\'ve been in Australia for less than a month.
I\'ve been in Boston way longer than you have.
I\'ve been looking for a better place to live.
Tom acted as if he didn\'t care what happened.
Tom and Mary didn\'t go to the dance together.
Tom, I found the picture you were looking for.
